product_description: Mind Reader 2-Tier Coffee Pod Drawer Organizer for Single-Serve Machines Create a clean, efficient coffee station with this two-tier single-serve pod drawer designed to store up to 72 coffee pods in one organized footprint. Featuring two smooth-gliding drawers with twelve total rows, it keeps flavors visible, sorted, and easy to access throughout the day. This organizer is intended to sit under a single-serve coffee brewing machine to help consolidate your coffee setup. Because coffee makers vary in height and cabinet clearance differs by space, customers are encouraged to measure their coffee machine and add the height of this drawer before ordering to ensure the full setup fits comfortably where they plan to place it. The drawer organizer itself measures 4.75 inches high. The flat top surface supports most single-serve brewers, while non-slip rubber feet help keep the unit stable during daily use. Durable plastic construction wipes clean easily with mild soap and a damp cloth, making it suitable for home kitchens, office breakrooms, dorm rooms, and shared coffee stations. This item ships in improved protective packaging designed to better safeguard the organizer during transit and help ensure it arrives ready for use.

name: Mind Reader REDCUP Coffee pod Drawer, One Size, Red 2
short_description: SAVE TIME IN THE MORNING: Making coffee shouldn’t have to be a frantic scavenger hunt. So forget racing through your kitchen drawers or cabinets every morning, desperately scrambling to find the right blend before you have to get out the door. Everything you'll need to make the coffee you want is perfectly organized for you here and is always on time.

THE PERFECT SPACE SAVER: Keep all 36 single coffee servings in one place. this pod holder easily stores them all in three drawers. Each drawer holds 12 coffee pods, allowing you to neatly organize your coffee and find them according to your taste, brand, or mood.

EASY TO CLEAN: Don't let spills or stains get in the way! Coffee stations can be messy, but this organizer is easily cleaned in just a few wipes. The top surface and inside drawers can be wiped effortlessly with a cloth or paper towel to remove even the tough stains.

SLEEK AND SIMPLE DESIGN: The MIND READER 'Anchor’ Triple Drawer Coffee Organizer is designed with a simple yet modern touch. Place it under any pod coffee maker, and watch it instantly blend into its office setting or kitchen decor. The surface is smooth and the silver handles are clean and luxurious.

COFFEE LOVERS WILL LOVE YOU: When it comes to your coffee-loving friends, we know they take their coffee seriously and drink it often! The best way to their hearts is by helping them get to their caffeine craving as easily and as organized as possible. Give them the gift of what they love most, inside a convenient and space-saving capsule pod holder.

RUBBER GRIPS: Kitchen countertops are notorious for having a slippery surface. But whether you're moving your Keurig/Dolce Gusto coffee machine or simply reaching into the drawer to pick out your favorite Verismo coffee pod, this coffee pod storage has rubber grips underneath so it always stays right where you want it to.

SOLID CONSTRUCTION: Your quality coffee deserves quality storage. Never again do you have to place your expensive finely brewed coffee inside the grip of a sticky, flimsy, poorly constructed k-cup carousel holder. Let this durable coffee storage made with upscale material reflect your tastes.

MINIMAL FOOTPRINT: Countertop real estate is hard to come by! So instead of taking up individual space for Assorted Flavors and Pods combine them all into one pod holder that stores as many as 36 pods in a minimal frame that fits snuggly under your coffee maker.

RELIABLE, AFFORDABLE, TRUSTED: The world of pod storage is a coffee cup filled with questionable ingredients. You can never be truly sure what you're going to get. But there is one coffee capsule holder that is reliable in construction, affordable in price, and that's the MIND READER 'Anchor'.
product_description: Neatly Store Your Coffee Accessories Whether you need extra space for coffee pods or your other coffee accessories, this countertop organizer works as both a base for your machine and convenient storage. You can separate your pods by type—regular, decaf, and tea, so you don't need to search for the right pod. While it has a large capacity and can hold 36 pods, its lightweight at 2 lbs. (0.91 kg) makes it easy to transport if you need to move your machine for a party or event. While this organizer fits neatly on your home countertop, it’s also a great addition to your office breakroom. Of course, everyone has different tastes, and this coffee pod holder can accommodate a wide range of choices, even in a busy office. The organizer has rubber grips on the base to ensure it stays in place. Its solid construction stands up to daily use. The pod organizer is perfect for your home or office, and makes a thoughtful gift for your favorite coffee lover.
